Martial Adept: Has the Combat Superiority feature with 2 maneuvers and 1 die

Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Combat Superiority: Can use a d6 Superiority Die to perform one of 2 chosen Maneuvers 1 time per short rest
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Sharpshooter: Suffers no disadvantage on attacks at long range/Ranged attacks ignore 3/4 cover/Can make a -5 attack with a ranged weapon to inflict +10 damage

Magic

Spells:
Dark Star (W8 Evoc): R150' 40' radius sphere inflicts 8d10 HP force (Constitution half), disintegrates dead, and negates sight and sound for conc up to 1 min
Fortune's Favor (W2 Divi): R60' Target gains Adv on 1 attack, ability, or save, or foe Disadv on 1 attack, within 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Gift Of Alacrity (W1 Divi): Willing touched gains +1d8 initiative for 8 hr
Gravity Fissure (W6 Evoc): 5'x100' line inflicts 8d8 HP force (Constitution half) and pulls and inflicts 8d8 HP force on creatures w/in 10' (Constitution neg) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Gravity Sinkhole (W4 Evoc): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d10 HP force and pulls to center (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Immovable Object (W2 Tran): Touched 10 lb object movable only by specified creatures (Strength move 10') and can support 4000 lb for 1 hr [+Level increases Strength DC +5/+10, increases object support to 8,000/20,000 lb, and extends duration to 24 hr/permanent at level 4/6]
Magnify Gravity (W1 Tran): R60' 10' radius inflicts 2d8 HP force and half speed (Constitution half HP only) for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Pulse Wave (W3 Evoc): 30' cone inflicts 6d6 HP force and pulls or pushes 15' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP and moves +5']
Ravenous Void (W9 Evoc): R1000' 20' radius inflicts 5d10 HP force and restrains, destroys dead and nonmagical objects, and creates 120' radius difficult terrain that pulls to center for conc up to 1 min
Reality Break (W8 Conj): R60' Target loses reactions and suffers random effects (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Sapping Sting (W0 Necr): R30' Target suffers 4d4 HP and knocked prone (Constitution neg)
Temporal Shunt (W5 Tran): R120' Can cast as a reaction to cause target to disappear for 1 rd, negating attack or spell cast (Wisdom neg) [+Level affects +1 target]
Tether Essence (W7 Necr): R60' Two targets lose and gain HP identically for conc up to 1 hr or until 0 HP (Constitution neg, Disadv if w/in 30')
Time Ravage (W9 Necr): R90' Target suffers 10d12 HP necrotic and aging to near-death (Constitution half HP only)
Wristpocket (W2 Conj): Self can move touched 5 lb object to and from an extradimensional space for conc up to 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Greater Portent: Can use Portent 3 times per long rest
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Divination Savant: Can copy divination spells into spellbook for half cost
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Expert Divination: Casting a divination spell restores a lower-level expended slot of up to level 5
Portent: Can replace a visible target's attack, ability, or saving throw with one of two pre-rolled values 3 times per long rest
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and spend 8 hr to change the choices
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
The Third Eye: Can use an action to gain 60' darkvision, 60' ethereal sight, the ability to read any language, or 10' invisibility sight until the next rest, once each per short rest
